https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7i2iflkM41WX6gTY1yPdxpzMxp4.jpg Astigmatism an experimental digital film written and directed by independent filmmaker Jon Red. Shot on mini-digital video it stars Robin Padilla and tells the story from the point of view and through the eyes of Bien an assassin who suffers from astigmatism. Astigmatism
